title: Classical conditioning study set - research groups

content.question: Which of the following best describes the experimental group in this research design?

choices.label: All 100 participants in the study were part of the experimental group.
The group that watched a commercial for the shoes that did not include a celebrity endorsement was the experimental group.
The group that watched a commercial for the shoes featuring a physically attractive celebrity was the experimental group.
This research did not involve an experimental group because there was no independent variable.

content.answer: The group that watched a commercial for the shoes featuring a physically attractive celebrity was the experimental group.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
